Package Lubomski_WGU_C195.controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
Lubomski_WGU_C195.controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the Main Menu screen. Initializes and handles user interactions on the Main Menu screen.

    • onAction_MainMenu_AddAppointment

      private void onAction_MainMenu_AddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action to add an appointment. Navigates to the Add Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.

    • onAction_MainMenu_UpdateAppointment

      void onAction_MainMenu_UpdateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action to update an appointment. Navigates to the Update Appointment screen if an appointment is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.

    • onAction_MainMenu_DeleteAppointment

      void onAction_MainMenu_DeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Handles the action to delete an appointment. Confirms and deletes the selected appointment.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • onAction_MainMenu_AddCustomer

      void onAction_MainMenu_AddCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action to add a new customer. Navigates to the Add Customer screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.

    • onAction_MainMenu_UpdateCustomer

      void onAction_MainMenu_UpdateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action to update a customer. Navigates to the Update Customer screen if a customer is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • onAction_MainMenu_DeleteCustomer

      void onAction_MainMenu_DeleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Handles the action to delete a customer. Confirms and deletes the selected customer if they have no current appointments.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.

    • onAction_MainMenu_LogOff

      void onAction_MainMenu_LogOff(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action to log off. Navigates back to the Login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The event(button) that triggered this action.

    • onAction_MainMenu_FilterReset

      void onAction_MainMenu_FilterReset(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Resets the appointment filter to show all appointments.

      event - The event(radio button) that triggered this action.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs.
